smarterAppMetadata.Subject: ELA
smarterAppMetadata.SufficientEvidenceOfClaim: (Organization) The student will use information provided in a stimulus to write organized narratives that engage and orient the reader by e. providing closure that follows logically from the narrative
smarterAppMetadata.EvidenceStatement: (Organization) The student will use information provided in a stimulus to write organized narratives that engage and orient the reader by e. providing closure that follows logically from the narrative
